title: Railworks TS2014 SSS GWR Panier Sound Pack
description:
GWR 57xx Pannier Tank Sound Pack for Falmouth Branch Pannier Tank Locomotive

One of the most iconic and numerous steam locomotives receives the Steam Sounds Supreme treatment.You've come to expect high quality sounds and that's exactly what you get, and more! You will now enjoy the following NEW features:

 
- Pilot and main valve sounds on the regulator
- Ejector(brake release) sounds
- Multiple whistle sounds including classic GWR two-tone whistles
- Injectors
- Blower
-Realistic Cylinder Drains Cocks
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢**New Steam Effects**


 To enjoy this pack, you MUST have the Falmouth Branch DLC.

A Few Notes About The Sounds

 To operate the whistles you'll want to know the following:
- Spacebar operates a standard whistle that offers a short 'toot' when released
- Shift+Spacebar gives you a deeper toned whistle
- B gives you random short whistles
- Shift+B plays random long whistles - This only works when in motion



Please support the developers and buy some of their content if you can afford it.


Please use the email address or the facebook fanpage for requests, questions and also if you want to share an addon with the community which we will post on your behalf.

If you would like to contribute, please read the Readme.pdf.




A Team tpb_4_ever upload.
